name: download
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bar_qr_code_generator.
Tool description: Generate barcodes and QR codes.
API description: Downloads a barcode of the specified type with the given data and optional size using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

type.description: The type of barcode to generate. Can be one of: 'qr_code', 'code_128a', 'code_128b', 'code_128c', 'code_25', 'code_25_interleaved', 'code_25_iata', 'code_39', 'code_93', 'gs1_128', 'ean_13', 'bookland', 'ean_8', 'upc_supplemental', 'codabar'.

data.description: The data to encode in the barcode.

size.description: The size of the barcode. Default is 5.
